Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic, from the rim of a vessel, inside of rim painted with black band.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394058) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394058)
